original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2)
analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya

original: 14.37. Saraṇaduka
analyzed: saraṇaduka

original: Saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: saraṇam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saraṇam dhammam paṭicca

original: naaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo ca naaraṇo
analyzed: na araṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saraṇam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ ca na araṇaḥ

original: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: araṇam dhammam paṭicca na araṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Saraṇañca araṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: saraṇam ca araṇam ca dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate pañca

original: Paccanīya
analyzed: paccanīya

original: Nahetu
analyzed: na hetu

original: Saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naaraṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
analyzed: saraṇam dhammam paṭicca na araṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati na hetu paccayā

original: Araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanaaraṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: araṇam dhammam paṭicca na na araṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati na hetu paccayā

original: Nahetuyā dve, na ārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā pañca …pe… napurejāte cattāri …pe… nakamme dve …pe… naāhāre naindriye najhāne namagge ekaṁ …pe… navippayutte dve …pe… novigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na hetuyā dve na ārammaṇe tīṇi na adhipatiyā pañca pe na purejāte cattāri pe na kamme dve pe na āhāre na indriye na jhāne na magge ekam pe na vippayutte dve pe no vigate tīṇi

original: (Sahajātavārampi paccayavārampi nissayavārampi saṁsaṭṭhavārampi sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṁ vitthāretabbaṁ.)
analyzed: sahajāta vāram pi paccaya vāram pi nissaya vāram pi sa saṭṭha vāram pi sampayutta vāram pi paṭicca vāra sadisam

original: Saraṇo dhammo nasaraṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Saraṇo dhammo naaraṇassa
analyzed: saraṇaḥ dhammaḥ na saraṇassa dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ saraṇaḥ dhammaḥ na araṇassa

original: dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Saraṇo dhammo nasaraṇassa ca naaraṇassa ca dhammassa
analyzed: dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ saraṇaḥ dhammaḥ na saraṇassa ca na araṇassa ca dhammassa

original: hetupaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: hetu paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Araṇo dhammo nasaraṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: araṇaḥ dhammaḥ na saraṇassa dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Saraṇo dhammo nasaraṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Saraṇo dhammo naaraṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: saraṇaḥ dhammaḥ na saraṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ saraṇaḥ dhammaḥ na araṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare cattāri …pe… sahajāte
analyzed: hetuyā cattāri ārammaṇe cattāri adhipatiyā pañca anantare cattāri pe sahajāte

original: pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte pacchājāte āsevane
analyzed: pañca aññamaññe dve nissaye satta upanissaye cattāri purejāte pacchājāte āsevane

original: dve, kamme cattāri, vipāke ekaṁ, āhāre …pe… magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte
analyzed: dve kamme cattāri vipāke eka āhāre pe magge cattāri sampayutte dve vippayutte

original: tīṇi …pe… avigate satta.
analyzed: tīṇi pe avigate satta

original: Saraṇo dhammo nasaraṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo, sahajātapaccayena paccayo, upanissayapaccayena paccayo, pacchājātapaccayena paccayo, kammapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: saraṇaḥ dhammaḥ na saraṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayo sahajāta paccayena paccayo upanissaya paccayena paccayo pacchājāta paccayena paccayo kamma paccayena paccayo

original: Saraṇo dhammo naaraṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo, sahajātapaccayena paccayo, upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: saraṇaḥ dhammaḥ na araṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ sahajāta paccayena paccayaḥ upanissaya paccayena paccayaḥ saṅkhitta

original: Nahetuyā satta, naārammaṇe satta, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare satta …pe… nasahajāte
analyzed: na hetuyā satta na ārammaṇe satta na adhipatiyā satta na anantare satta pe na sahajāte

original: pañca, naaññamaññe nanissaye pañca …pe… napurejāte cha …pe… nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte
analyzed: pañca na aññamaññe na nissaye pañca pe na purejāte cha pe na sampayutte pañca na vippayutte

original: cattāri …pe… noavigate cattāri.
analyzed: cattāri pe no avigate cattāri

original: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe cattāri. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetu paccayāḥ na ārammaṇe cattāri

original: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe cattāri. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na hetu paccayā ārammaṇe cattāri

original: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvāraṁ evaṁ vitthāretabbaṁ.)
analyzed: yathā kusala ttike pañhāvāram evam
